title: New honor update
body: So I was watching the video and something I wonder wasn't touched on...how does honoring a friend work? Could I just play with 4 or 5 friends and we just always honor each other and seemingly cheat the system?

replies.body: What's wrong with honoring friends?  :D  Per the new [Honor Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148), there will be systems in check to squash potential exploits and will offer no benefit.  No worries!

But to what point? I play mostly with 2 or 3 friends.. and if someone else is deserving of honor I give it to them but if not I give it to a friend that did the best. Does your friend get no points then? If so should I only honor the other 2 people if there are 3 of us even if they dont really deserve it just because it useless for my friends? Its very vague in its description :S
